remarks: Relate a limit of a real-valued sequence at infinity to the continuity of the function ` S ( y ) = R ( 1 / y ) ` at zero.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Mar-2015.)
statement:
rlimcnp.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ ( 0 [,) +oo ) ) $.
rlimcnp.0 $e |- ( ph -> 0 e. A ) $.
rlimcnp.b $e |- ( ph -> B C_ RR+ ) $.
rlimcnp.r $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> R e. CC ) $.
rlimcnp.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR+ ) -> ( x e. A <-> ( 1 / x ) e. B ) ) $.
rlimcnp.c $e |- ( x = 0 -> R = C ) $.
rlimcnp.s $e |- ( x = ( 1 / y ) -> R = S ) $.
rlimcnp.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
rlimcnp.k $e |- K = ( J |`t A ) $.
rlimcnp $p |- ( ph -> ( ( y e. B |-> S ) ~~>r C <-> ( x e. A |-> R ) e. ( ( K CnP J ) ` 0 ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y $.
$d R y $.
$d S x $.
$d ph x y $.
